design_identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Functionality as Art. Structural Void.

headings.usage: Section headers, App titles, Modal titles

usage_rules.selection: Use Blue (#3b82f6) for selection and focus states.
usage_rules.action: Use Orange (#f97316) for primary actions (Add Block, Save) and High Priority highlights.
usage_rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use flat colors or subtle noise textures only.
usage_rules.glass: Use strictly for floating panels (toasts, command palette). backdrop-blur-md bg-black/70 border border-white/10.

grid_system.tree_row: flex items-center gap-2 py-1 px-2 group

blocks.visual_style: Minimalist Card. No shadow by default. 1px border (#27272a).
blocks.drag_handle: Visible on hover. Cursor-grab. Icon: GripVertical.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-transparent hover:border-border focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-sm px-2 py-1 transition-all

status_badges.style: text-[10px] uppercase tracking-wider font-bold px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-sm border

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for the active path in the tree view. A subtle vertical line that connects the hierarchy.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Apply a subtle SVG noise overlay to the sidebar background for texture.
visual_enhancers.depth: Use layered z-index for floating menus. No heavy drop shadows. Use 1px borders for separation.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide-react. Stroke width: 1.5px (Thin/Technical feel). Size: 16px for UI, 20px for headers.

motion.list_reorder: Use framer-motion 'layout' prop for smooth reordering.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-muted (#a1a1aa) is readable on dark bg. Minimum 4.5:1 for main text.

instructions_to_main_agent.1: Implement the 'Structural Void' theme immediately. Override default Shadcn zinc colors with the custom palette in globals.css.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: Create a 'Block' component that is recursive. It must handle its own children rendering.
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Use 'react-beautiful-dnd' or '@hello-pangea/dnd' for drag and drop (check package.json or install). If not available, simple HTML5 DnD is acceptable but less polished.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Ensure the Tree View allows collapsing/expanding. State must be preserved.
instructions_to_main_agent.5: The 'Editor' is inline. Clicking a block title turns it into an input. No separate 'Edit Page' unless it's for deep details.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Use LocalStorage for all data persistence. Create a 'StorageManager' utility.
